sentences.en: Announcements were made over the loudspeaker system.
BERLIN (Reuters) -- Before leaving on vacation, a German couple set up a loudspeaker and timer rigged to blast their neighbors with the sound of a crowing cock every morning.
sentences.cn: 柏林(路透社)：一对德国夫妇在外出度假前安装好了扩音器和定时装置,使其在每天凌晨用刺耳的公鸡啼叫声骚扰邻居。

sentences.en: Excuse me, did the loudspeaker say that a watch had been found?
sentences.cn: 外宾:对不起, 刚才广播里说拾到了一块手表,是 吗 ?

sentences.en: I distinctly heard the loudspeaker calling passengers for the Turin-Amsterdam flight.
sentences.cn: 我清楚地听到扩音器里在请都灵至阿姆斯特丹航班的旅客登机。

sentences.en: Nearly all serious loudspeaker designs have incorporated a crossover network.
sentences.cn: 几乎所有严肃的扬声器设计都会涉及分频网络.

sentences.en: Oh, I've forgotten about the loudspeaker!
sentences.cn: 哦, 我忘了扬声器的事!

sentences.en: On the loudspeaker his voice turned dull and cranky.
sentences.cn: 在扬声器中,他的声音变得沉闷,听起来别扭.

sentences.en: The loudspeaker announced each airplane as it landed at the airport.
sentences.cn: 每架飞机在机场一着陆,扩音器就发出通告.

sentences.en: The loudspeaker announced the arrival of the train.
The loudspeaker is too loud and thus a bit noisy.
sentences.cn: 这个扩大器的声音很大,有点闹了!

sentences.en: The nurse paged the doctor on the loudspeaker.
sentences.cn: 护士通过广播喊叫那位医生.

sentences.en: The police addressed the crowd through a loudspeaker on their car.
sentences.cn: 警察通过他们汽车上的喇叭向人群喊话.

sentences.en: The voltage of the amplified signal at the loudspeaker is 2 V.
sentences.cn: 扬声器放大了的信号的电势为2伏.

sentences.en: Their names were called over the loudspeaker .
sentences.cn: 喇叭里叫着他们的名字。

sentences.en: There is a loudspeaker in a radio.
We heard the news over the loudspeaker.
sentences.cn: 我们听见扩音器里广播了这一消息.

trans.tran_cn: 扩音器，扬声器，喇叭，扬场器
trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment used to make sounds louder
